mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_settle_account_flow ( flow_no, settlement_record_id, account_id, settle_audit_record_id, account_user_type, order_no, refund_order_no, before_amount, after_amount, out_amount, income_amount, app_id, trade_date, settle_date, change_time, type, remark, status ) VALUES ( #{flowNo}, #{settlementRecordId}, #{accountId}, #{settleAuditRecordId}, #{accountUserType}, #{orderNo}, #{refundOrderNo}, #{beforeAmount}, #{afterAmount}, #{outAmount}, #{incomeAmount}, #{appId}, #{tradeDate}, #{settleDate}, #{changeTime}, #{type}, #{remark}, #{status} );
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_settle_account_flow SET settle_audit_record_id = #{settleAuditRecordId}, status = 1 WHERE app_id = 'hsy' AND settle_date = #{settleDate} AND type = 1 AND status = 0 AND account_id = #{accountId}
UPDATE tb_settle_account_flow SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM tb_settle_account_flow WHERE order_no = #{orderNo} AND account_id = #{accountId} AND type = #{type}

SELECT account_user_type, account_id, count(id) AS count, SUM(income_amount) AS amount, MAX(trade_date) AS trade_start_date, MIN(trade_date) AS trade_end_date FROM tb_settle_account_flow WHERE app_id = 'hsy' AND settle_date = #{settleDate} AND type = 1 AND status = 0 AND account_user_type IN (1, 3) GROUP BY account_user_type, account_id;
SELECT count(0) FROM tb_settle_account_flow WHERE app_id = 'hsy' AND settle_date = #{settleDate} AND type = 2
SELECT count(0) FROM tb_settle_account_flow WHERE flow_no = #{flowNo}
SELECT DISTINCT(order_no) FROM tb_settle_account_flow WHERE settle_audit_record_id = #{recordId}
